title: Global Product Lifecycle Management (PLM) Strategy Expert Program

context.prior_knowledge: Knowledge of manufacturing/IT industry processes and basic product development principles
context.additional_context: University-industry collaboration program to strengthen job relevance for current practitioners, designed for smartphone-based accessibility and time efficiency

learning_goals: Learners can derive at least three key performance indicators (KPIs) for each product development stage when establishing a global PLM strategy
Learners can interpret product lifecycle data analysis results with over 80% accuracy using PLM software tools
Learners can design one optimized strategic roadmap for their organization by comparing PLM application cases across industries

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
